the_fool.name: The Fool
the_fool.description: A new journey begins with instinct, not information. Drawn by wonder that overcomes fear. Trust rises before certainty and opens the gate to both freedom and folly.
the_fool.visual_description: The Fool stands on the precipice of a cliff, caught in the first breath of a journey...
the_fool.general_meaning: The Fool represents beginnings—the sacred first step into the unknown...
the_fool.love: In love readings, The Fool often signals new beginnings—a budding relationship...
the_fool.spiritual: The Fool is the archetypal pilgrim—not a teacher or master, but the one who walks...
the_fool.career: The Fool in career readings can indicate a new opportunity, project, or path...
the_fool.reversed: Reversed, The Fool suggests hesitation, recklessness, or naivety...

the_magician.name: The Magician
the_magician.description: With one hand to the sky and one to the earth, he channels energy from spirit into matter...
the_magician.visual_description: The Magician stands poised between worlds. One arm reaches upward...
the_magician.general_meaning: The Magician is a card of manifestation, action, and alignment...
the_magician.love: In love, the Magician signals charisma, attraction, and intentional connection...
the_magician.spiritual: Spiritually, the Magician is the first conscious awakening of power...
the_magician.career: In career readings, the Magician signals a green light for action...
the_magician.reversed: Reversed, the Magician warns of manipulation, misalignment, or lost potential...
